newsitem.title: KENYA: Kenyan bandits slay 57 people including policemen.
newsitem.headline: Kenyan bandits slay 57 people including policemen.

text.p: Bandits raided a remote Kenyan village last Sunday and gunned down 57 people, including 16 policemen rushed in to tackle them, a police statement said on Saturday.

The statement faxed to Reuters said seven more people were hospitalised after the attack in a village in the northeastern Marsabit district while 21 others were treated for minor wounds and discharged.
